Chord Display

A free web application to show chords and notes being played with a MIDI keyboard

Version 0.2.2 - Developed by Rémi Jarasson (https://rednet.io)

Powered by tonaljs -

This project is no longer maintained.

You can find Chord Display as a module of MIDI Jar
